name: Jacky Ickx
introduction: Jacques Bernard "Jacky" Ickx (ICKS or IX; born January 1, 1945 in Brussels, Brussels-Capital Region, Belgium) is a Belgian former racing driver who competed in Formula One from 1967 to 1979, finishing as runner-up on two occasions (1969 and 1970), winning eight Grands Prix and finishing on the podium 25 times.
